plot: Documentary film 'The Singing City' introduces us to the unique life style of the people of Cadiz, a small-big city in the south of Spain by the Atlantic bay, capital of liberty in the true sense of the words, where human relations and people's voices are still the first in place. During the Cadiz street Carnival, demonstration of creativity and open-mindedness, with a lot of good humor, incredible energy, sincerity and musicality 'Los Gaditanos' (inhabitants of Cadiz) tell us their story in an symphonic mixture of street interviews and singing in the streets. That could inspire everyone in searching ways how to deal with the economic crisis and how to get happy, proving that material crisis does not have to lead into social crisis.
title: La ciudad que canta
